base_nl_query: Plot a line chart showing the number of blocks produced monthly in 2021?
nl_query: Plot a line chart showing the number of blocks produced monthly in 2021?
normalized_query: ENTITY_BLOCK PERIOD YEAR number per produce
expected_sparql:
PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

SELECT ?timePeriod (COUNT(?block) as ?blockCount)
WHERE {
  ?block a b:Block ;
    b:hasTimestamp ?timestamp .

  BIND ("2021-01-01T00:00:00Z"^^xsd:dateTime AS ?startTime)
  BIND ("2021-12-31T23:59:59Z"^^xsd:dateTime AS ?endTime)
  BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?timestamp), 1, 7) AS ?timePeriod)
  FILTER (?timestamp >= ?startTime && ?timestamp <= ?endTime)
}
GROUP BY ?timePeriod
ORDER BY ?timePeriod

base_nl_query: What is your latest update?
nl_query: What is your latest update?
normalized_query: DEF_0 late update your

base_nl_query: How many blocks cardano up to March 14, 2021?
nl_query: How many blocks cardano up to March 14, 2021?
normalized_query: DAY ENTITY_BLOCK QUANT_0 YEAR march up

base_nl_query: Which transactions had the highest fees in epoch 300?
nl_query: Which transactions had the highest fees in epoch 300?
normalized_query: ENTITY_EPOCH ENTITY_TX N fee high hold
expected_sparql:
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>
PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

SELECT ?txHash ?fee
WHERE {
  ?epoch c:hasEpochNumber "300"^^xsd:decimal .
  ?block c:hasEpoch ?epoch ;
    b:hasTx ?tx .
  ?tx b:hasTxID ?txHash ;
    c:hasFee ?fee .
}
GROUP BY ?txHash ?fee
ORDER BY DESC(?fee)
LIMIT 5

base_nl_query: plot a line chart showing monthly tps on 2025
nl_query: plot a line chart showing monthly tps on 2025
normalized_query: ENTITY_TPS PERIOD YEAR per
expected_sparql:
PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

SELECT
  ?timePeriod
  ((SUM(?txCount) / (30 * 24 * 60 * 60)) AS ?tps)
WHERE {
  ?block a b:Block ;
      b:hasTxCount ?txCount ;
      b:hasTimestamp ?timestamp .
  BIND ("2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"^^xsd:dateTime AS ?startTime)
  BIND ("2025-12-31T23:59:59Z"^^xsd:dateTime AS ?endTime)
  BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?timestamp), 1, 7) AS ?timePeriod)
  FILTER (?timestamp >= ?startTime && ?timestamp <= ?endTime)
}
GROUP BY ?timePeriod
ORDER BY ?timePeriod

base_nl_query: How many addresses were ever created?
nl_query: Count the number of addresses were ever created?
normalized_query: address number
expected_sparql:
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>
PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?address) AS ?numAddresses)
WHERE {
  ?account b:hasAddress ?address .
}

base_nl_query: How many proposals launched today?
nl_query: How many proposals launched today?
normalized_query: ENTITY_PROPOSAL N ORDER_END QUANT_0 launch
expected_sparql:
PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>
SELECT
  (COUNT(?proposal) AS ?proposalCount)
  ?date
WHERE {
  ?proposal a c:GovernanceProposal .
  ?tx c:hasGovernanceProposal ?proposal .
  ?block b:hasTx ?tx ;
         b:hasTimestamp ?timestamp .

  BIND(xsd:date(?timestamp) AS ?date)
  BIND (xsd:date(NOW()) as ?startDate)
  FILTER (?date >= ?startDate)
}
GROUP BY ?date
ORDER BY ?date

base_nl_query: Plot a line chart with top 5 tokens most frequently transferred in the last year
nl_query: Plot a line chart with top 5 tokens most frequently transferred in the last year
normalized_query: ENTITY_TOKEN N N N ORDER_END ORDER_TOP ORDER_TOP frequently transfer year
expected_sparql:
PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

SELECT ?timePeriod ?tokenName (COUNT(?output) as ?transfers)
WHERE {
    ?block a b:Block ;
      b:hasTimestamp ?timestamp ;
      b:hasTx ?tx .

    BIND (NOW() - "P365D"^^xsd:dayTimeDuration as ?startTime)
    FILTER (?timestamp >= ?startTime)

    ?tx c:hasTxOutput ?output .
    ?output b:hasTokenState ?tokenState .
    ?tokenState b:hasCurrency ?token .
    ?token b:hasTokenName ?tokenName .
    # using month as default time period aggregator when time goes back 180 days or more
    BIND( SUBSTR(STR(?timestamp), 1, 7) AS ?timePeriod )
}
GROUP BY ?timePeriod ?tokenName
ORDER BY DESC(?transfers)
LIMIT 5

base_nl_query: Each bubble represents a governance proposal from the latest 30 proposals, positioned by total votes and number of unique voters, with bubble size showing how many votes included a rationale.
nl_query: Each bubble represents a governance proposal from the latest 30 proposals, positioned by total votes and number of unique voters, with bubble size showing how many votes included a rationale.
normalized_query: ENTITY_METADATA ENTITY_PROPOSAL ENTITY_VOTING ENTITY_VOTING N QUANT_0 and bubble bubble by each governance_proposal hold late number position size sum unique voter

base_nl_query: List the number of NFTs minted in the last month
nl_query: List the number of NFTs minted in the last month
normalized_query: DURATION mint nfts number

base_nl_query: Top 10 tokens by transfer count in the last week
nl_query: Top 10 tokens by transfer count in the last week
normalized_query: DURATION ENTITY_TOKEN N ORDER_TOP by transfer
expected_sparql:
PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

SELECT ?tokenName (COUNT(?output) as ?transfers)
WHERE {
    ?block a b:Block ;
      b:hasTimestamp ?timestamp ;
      b:hasTx ?tx .

    BIND (NOW() - "P7D"^^xsd:dayTimeDuration as ?startTime)
    FILTER (?timestamp >= ?startTime)

    ?tx c:hasTxOutput ?output .
    ?output b:hasTokenState ?tokenState .
    ?tokenState b:hasCurrency ?token .
    ?token b:hasTokenName ?tokenName .
}
GROUP BY ?tokenName
ORDER BY DESC(?transfers)
LIMIT 10

base_nl_query: Plot a line chart showing number of new wallets per year from 2020 to 2025
nl_query: Plot a line chart showing number of new wallets per year from 2020 to 2025
normalized_query: ENTITY_ACCOUNT PERIOD YEAR YEAR new number per
expected_sparql:
PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

SELECT
  ?timePeriod
  (COUNT(DISTINCT ?account) AS ?walletCount)
WHERE {
  ?account a b:Account ;
         c:hasCreationTimestamp ?timestamp .
  BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?timestamp), 1, 4) AS ?timePeriod)
  BIND ("2020-01-01T00:00:00Z"^^xsd:dateTime AS ?startTime)
  BIND ("2025-12-31T23:59:59Z"^^xsd:dateTime AS ?endTime)
  FILTER (?timestamp >= ?startTime && ?timestamp <= ?endTime)
}
GROUP BY ?timePeriod
ORDER BY ?timePeriod

base_nl_query: What is your sync status?
nl_query: What is your sync status?
normalized_query: DEF_0 ENTITY_STATUS sync your
expected_sparql:
PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>

SELECT ?currentCardanoHeight (MAX(?blockNum) AS ?capBlockNum) (COUNT(?block) AS ?count)
WHERE {
  c:Cardano c:hasBlockNumber ?currentCardanoHeight .
  ?block a b:Block .
  ?block c:hasBlockNumber ?blockNum .
}
GROUP BY (?currentCardanoHeight)

base_nl_query: What is your sync status?
nl_query: Tell me your sync status?
normalized_query: ENTITY_STATUS sync tell your
expected_sparql:
PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>

SELECT ?currentCardanoHeight (MAX(?blockNum) AS ?capBlockNum) (COUNT(?block) AS ?count)
WHERE {
  c:Cardano c:hasBlockNumber ?currentCardanoHeight .
  ?block a b:Block .
  ?block c:hasBlockNumber ?blockNum .
}
GROUP BY (?currentCardanoHeight)

base_nl_query: Plot a line chart showing the number of proposals submitted daily in the last month
nl_query: Plot a line chart showing the number of proposals submitted daily in the last month
normalized_query: DURATION ENTITY_PROPOSAL PERIOD number per submit
expected_sparql:
PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

SELECT
  (COUNT(?proposal) AS ?proposalCount)
  ?timePeriod
WHERE {
  BIND(NOW() - "P30D"^^xsd:dayTimeDuration AS ?startTime)
  ?block b:hasTx ?tx ;
    b:hasTimestamp ?timestamp .

  BIND(SUBSTR(STR(?timestamp), 1, 10) AS ?timePeriod)
  FILTER (?timestamp >= ?startTime)

  ?proposal a c:GovernanceProposal .

  ?tx c:hasGovernanceProposal ?proposal ;
    b:hasTxID ?proposalTxHash .
}
GROUP BY ?timePeriod
ORDER BY ?timePeriod

base_nl_query: Plot a bar chart showing monthly smart contract deployments

PREFIX b: <https://mobr.ai/ont/blockchain#>
PREFIX c: <https://mobr.ai/ont/cardano#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

SELECT
  ?timePeriod
  (COUNT(DISTINCT ?script) AS ?deployments)
WHERE {
  ?script a c:PlutusScript ;
          c:hasCreationTimestamp ?timestamp .

  BIND( SUBSTR(STR(?timestamp), 1, 7) AS ?timePeriod )
}
GROUP BY ?timePeriod
ORDER BY ?timePeriod
